author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Entrepreneurship Development Institute of India (Ahmedabad) and Entrepreneurship Development Cell, PSG College of Arts and Science and FICCI FLO, Coimbatore, will conduct a 25-day, free of cost.

25 days

Sponsored by the Department of Science and Technology, Government of India, the programme will extend from February 1 to 29.

Eligibility

Any person within the age group of 21 years to 30 years, with either an under graduation degree or a diploma, can apply for the training.

Interested people can apply with their resume topsgedc@gmail.com.

Contact

Contact numbers:

FICCI FLO - Lakshmi Ramachandran (9443338935), Poonam Bafna (9361333111). Organisers R. Krishnakumar ( 9842252308), N. Krishnaveni (9443760648), Dr. Rohini Sharma (9363104733), and R. Swarnalatha (9486710231), a press release says.
title: Entrepreneurship Development Programme
